item.title: Introduction to the SQL MERGE
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop The SQL MERGE statement can be used to perform an INSERT, UPDATE and/or DELETE all in one statement. This post is just an introduction and does not address any performance issues or other bugs with the statement. See here (although out of date) for a list of potential bugs.
